list_page_teaser: The two True Detectives in the first season have personalities as different as night and day.  Click to learn more!
description_html:
Detectives Marty Hart and Rust Cohle have very different personalities, to say the least.

Mild Spoiler Alert (vague only)! After a bit of a struggle starting out, they learn how to get along and build on each others' strengths and connections.
story_html:
The substantial amounts of Green (for Thinking) in both of their portraits represents their no-nonsense approach to their work. Their different backgrounds and personal lives may interfere from time to time, but the universal appeal of this logic gives them common ground and they share an important goal: to get the bad guys.

I've thoroughly enjoyed watching both seasons of this show! Listening to the commentary tracks — which are excellent in quality — Nic Pizzolatto impresses me as a very perceptive individual. I am definitely hopeful that there will be additional seasons!

Be sure to check out the True Detective Season 2 gallery on this site!
